description:
As the days get cooler, Saku wants to pull out their kotatsu. However, she had forgotten theirs had to be thrown out due to certain events. Later, Saku`s mother starts bothering her for pictures of Yukichi which causes a great photography dilemma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Shashin Utsuri ga Ii
デキる猫は写真映りがいい
